data.name: Next Up Hero - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Composed by David J Franco and fully remastered for the OST, the Next Up Hero soundtrack is an original album crafted the Spiral Shards and the Spoke World universe. © 2018 Digital Continue LLC, all rights reserved.

1. Hero's Call
2. Session Jam
3. Quinn of Kairos
4. Ovalia of Ellora
5. The First Hero
6. A New Hero Rises
7. Crushendo
8. Hero Isms
9. Totem Tangle
10. Song of the Syren
11. Bombadil
12. Hero is Fire
13. Hero Down Below
14. Get Up Now
15. Paladrin on Piano
16. CatBomb
17. BeatDown
18. An Old Friend Returns
19. Hero Down
20. Who Made This
21. The Enemy Approaches
22. My Voice with Yours
23. Another Day at the Office
24. Hugs to My Echoes
25. The Spiral Shards
26. A Warm Place
27. Death Defy
28. Jam of Heroes
29. The Academy Blues
30. Uncovering of Erf Volume 1
31. Uncovering of Erf Volume 2
32. Uncovering of Erf Volume 3
33. A Champion Enters

data.short_description: Composed by David J Franco and fully remastered for the OST, the Next Up Hero soundtrack is an original album crafted the Spiral Shards and the Spoke World universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 10Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz Intel Core i3 or 3.1 GHz AMD A8-6700Intel Core i3 (3.4 GHz) or AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6850 / NVIDIA GeForce 650 / Intel Iris Pro 5200
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1 GB VRAM; Windows 8 & 8.1 are unsupported

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12, 10.13
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5 (4 Cores)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6970M, GeForce GTX 680MX, or Intel Iris Pro (5200)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
